text: Igor Nikolaevich Smirnov (, tr. Igorʹ Nikolayevich Smirnov; ; born 23 October 1941) is a Transnistrian politician. He was the first president (1991–2011) of the internationally unrecognized Pridnestrovian Moldovan Republic. He supported Transnistria becoming part of Russia. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Transnistria
title: Igor Smirnov
